availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Milton D. Brown (Christian County, Kentucky, schoolteacher and trader)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, schoolteacher and trader. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Brown and Rebecca Brown. Married to Sallie A. Daniel Brown in Todd County, Kentucky, on August 9, 1862. Father of Horace F. Brown. Attended school in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned eight enslaved persons in Christian County in 1850. Schoolteacher and trader in Christian County in 1860. Household owned five enslaved persons in Christian County in 1860.
